definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: trampling-place, trampling;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Mic 7:10 +, [[מִרְמַס]] (Kö:ii.1, 96) Is 10:6; cstr. [[מִרְמַס]] Is 7:25, Ez Eze 34:19;—
trampling, ´[[וְהָיׇה לְמ]]: Is 5:5 it shall become a trampling, be trampled down, so Mic 7:10, Is 28:18 [[והייתם לו למרמס]], cf. Is 10:6, Da 8:13.
